attributes.action: Re-Established The "True Vision" -  Online Hate Crime Reporting Website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
True Vision was launched in May 2004 and was aimed at improving the service the police provide to minority communities, It was given the blessing of the then Home Secretary David Blunkett.

43 police forces have since joined together to provide communities with a single self-reporting and information pack together with an on-line facility (which has since been taken off line) that would allow minority communities to report hate crime directly to the police.
This facility is much needed to help tackle the under reporting of hate crime in the united kingdom.
